participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

PASE_01.LongName: Over the past 7 days, how often did you participate in <u>sitting activities</u> such as reading, watching TV, or doing handcrafts?

PASE_01b.LongName: On average, how many hours per day did you engage in these <u>sitting activities</u>?

PASE_02.LongName: Over the past 7 days, how often did you take a <u>walk</u> outside your home or yard for any reason? For example, for fun or exercise, walking to work, walking the dog, walking in a mall, etc?

PASE_02b.LongName: On average, how many hours per day did you spend <u>walking</u>?

PASE_03.LongName: Over the past 7 days, how often did you engage in <u>light sport or recreational activities</u> such as bowling, golf with a cart, shuffleboard, fishing from a boat or pier or other similar activities?

PASE_03b.LongName: On average, how many hours per day did you engage in these <u>light sport or recreational activities</u>?

PASE_04.LongName: Over the past 7 days, how often did you engage in <u>moderate sport or recreational activities</u> such as doubles tennis, ballroom dancing, hunting, ice skating, golf without a cart, softball or other similar activities?

PASE_04b.LongName: On average, how many hours per day did you engage in these <u>moderate sport or recreational activities</u>?

PASE_05.LongName: Over the past 7 days, how often did you engage in <u>strenuous sport or recreational activities</u> such as jogging, swimming, cycling, singles tennis, aerobic dance, skiing (downhill or cross country) or other similar activities?

PASE_05b.LongName: On average, how many hours per day did you engage in these <u>strenuous sport and recreational activities</u>?

PASE_06.LongName: Over the past 7 days, how often did you do any <u>exercises specifically to increase muscle strength or endurance, such as lifting weights or pushups, etc.</u>?

PASE_06b.LongName: On average, how many hours per day did you engage in <u>exercises to increase muscle strength and/or endurance </u>?

PASE_07.LongName: During the past 7 days, have you done any light housework, such as dusting, washing or drying dishes, or ironing?

PASE_08.LongName: During the past 7 days, have you done any heavy housework or chores such as vacuuming, scrubbing floors, washing windows, or carrying wood?

PASE_09a.LongName: During the past 7 days, did you engage in home repairs like painting, wallpapering, electrical work, etc.?

PASE_09b.LongName: During the past 7 days, did you engage in lawn work or yard care, including snow or leaf removal, chopping wood, etc.?

PASE_09c.LongName: During the past 7 days, did you engage in outdoor gardening?

PASE_09d.LongName: During the past 7 days, did you engage in caring for another person such as a child, dependent spouse, or another adult?

PASE_10.LongName: During the past 7 days, did you work for pay or as a volunteer?

PASE_10a.LongName: How many hours per week did you work for pay and/or as a volunteer?

PASE_10b.LongName: Which of the following categories best describes the amount of physical activity required on your job and/or volunteer work?

Levels.1: Mainly sitting with slight arm movements. (Examples: office worker, watchmaker, seated assembly line worker, bus driver, etc.)
Levels.2: Sitting or standing with some walking.(EXAMPLES: cashier, general office worker, light tool and machinery worker.)
Levels.3: Walking, with some handling of materials generally weighing less than 50 pounds.(EXAMPLES: mailman, waiter/waitress, construction worker,machinery worker.)
Levels.4: Walking and heavy manual labor often requiring handling of materials over 50 pounds. (EXAMPLES: lumberjack, stone mason, farm or general laborer.)

PASE_19.LongName: Lawn Work or Yard Care Score
